backend/main.mo: Defines data types and initial book list for a meditation app backend actor, including journal entries, profiles, sessions, progress, and rituals.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and config files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Step‑by‑step instructions for redeploying the app, listing prerequisites and standard deployment steps.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Troubleshooting template for diagnosing deployment failures across install, backend, build, and runtime stages.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based CSS variables, themes, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting up favicon, error handlers, environment shims, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all main pages and wraps the app in theme and error boundary providers.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Interactive carousel for selecting ambient audio with swipe navigation, volume control, and preview playback logic.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches UI errors and displays a detailed error screen with message, stack trace, and reload button.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Destructive alert banner for cloud sync/load errors with retry button and optional loading state.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical nav bar with animated icons that navigate to journal, progress, books, and knowledge pages.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide-out menu offering theme toggling, authentication actions, and navigation, integrated with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Paginated reader for knowledge pages with swipe, arrow key, and button navigation plus automatic scrolling.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel selector for knowledge categories with touch, keyboard, and circular navigation plus animated scaling.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Quiz dialog that shuffles questions, tracks answers, shows progress, and displays results with retake option.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus model that animates petals, glow, and bloom behavior based on a growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Three.js particle system that animates particles around the lotus with coherent or chaotic motion based on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Draws animated lotus petals and particles on a canvas with theme- and variant-based visibility effects.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Carousel UI for selecting meditation types with swipe, button navigation, and centered card scaling.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Step-by-step meditation guide with swipe navigation, animations, and parsed content sections.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that navigates users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered bowl showing meditation progress as animated liquid fill with glow effects.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: 3D lotus visualization using React Three Fiber, with lighting, particles, and growth-state animation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG-based animated lotus showing growth, glow, and breathing effects driven by total minutes and streak.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Interactive multi-question quiz dialog that collects user answers and computes a recommended meditation type.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Modal that displays up to five saved rituals and allows users to start or delete them.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Carousel UI for browsing, starting, and deleting saved meditation rituals with swipe and delete confirmation handling.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Session status indicator that shows guest or logged-in state and provides navigation and logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and authentication status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for meditation data, daily quotes, session recording, and guest vs authenticated branching, including mock meditation types and cloud-sync handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, OKLCH color themes for light and dark modes, and custom animation utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of recommended meditation-related books with metadata and Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Provides structured multimedia content for meditation techniques, including descriptions, pages, and quizzes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Displays swipeable book recommendation cards with theme toggle and navigation, handling circular indexing and touch gestures.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows daily quotes, meditation options, rituals, and session UI with theme toggling and CRUD actions for rituals.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Manages journal entries with search, filters, editing, mood/energy icons, and import/export plus cloud sync actions.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Renders meditation knowledge categories, book content, quizzes, and deep-link scrolling with category state handling.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen with theme toggle, login via Internet Identity, guest mode, and automatic redirect for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Page for configuring a meditation session with guides, mood/energy inputs, ambient audio, and journal/ritual saving.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays meditation progress stats, rank info, and supports data export/import with cloud sync handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for reflection features.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for statistics features.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Utility for checking cloud sync readiness, waiting with retries, and mapping backend errors to user-friendly messages.
Local storage handlers for saving and retrieving quiz scores, with identity-aware keying and a React hook wrapper.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Calculates lotus growth visualization parameters based on total meditation minutes across multiple phases.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Manages guest-only local storage for journal entries, progress data, rituals, and migrates legacy keys.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines meditation rank tiers and helpers for determining current/next rank and minutes until advancement.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL params (including hash), storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persistence and cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, shadows, radii, and enabling plugins for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing issues and features related to routing the Pre-Meditation page’s “More details” button to the correct Knowledge category.
